name: DuckDuckGo for Widescreens and 21x9
description: A responsive restyle, from 1300px to 2560+ (no limit), centering the searchbar and the results, and doing a few minor adaptations (typo size, colours).
additional_info:
- Everything as been tested from 1300 to 2560 px in all search modes, and is bullet proof AFAIK.
- Searchbar is centered, same for the toolbar.
- Search input is enlarged to 700px when above 1920px.
- Search results are enlarged and centered.
- The centering process of search result is offset (padding-left) a little bit when reaching +2000px, to make the reading more comfortable.
- Results typo as been enlarged just a bit.
- Results margin-bottom has been reduced a bit.
- Various colours sets are proposed, to customize the results looking to your personal taste (more flexible than the DDGo original settings). Just comment/uncomment the code blocks you want on the bottom of the CSS code. By default an ORANGE style is applied, but you can go back to a BLUE one.
